channel.title: Coding new NPCs
channel.description: I've been attempting to code some new NPCs just for fun, but i'm having trouble getting them to behave the way i want them to, ive tried the valve developer wiki and the mailing list etc (which seems a very tedious way of finding information) I was wondering if perhaps the devs or someone else had a good link to a tutorial that goes into more detail than the valve wiki. Cheers

item.title: Coding new NPCs
item.dc:creator: Ice
item.description:
I’ve been attempting to code some new NPCs just for fun, but i’m having trouble getting them to behave the way i want them to, ive tried the valve developer wiki and the mailing list etc (which seems a very tedious way of finding information) I was wondering if perhaps the devs or someone else had a good link to a tutorial that goes into more detail than the valve wiki. Cheers

Read full topic
